data.text: @GMB Not fair at all my husband got a fine 3 wks after and he was doing 59 in a 40 just after coming back off a family holiday at 4am where's the justice £100 and 3 points not fair at all😡
@GMB Surely it's 14 working days like everything else - typical celeb wriggling out of it
@GMB No
@GMB So much for him being a fair man #petulant
@GMB Should be treated the same as everyone else,he’s nothing special.
@GMB He was never much good at taking penalties😃
@GMB Breaking the law is breaking the law - whether the letter was a day late or not he was still speeding. I am a huge Beckham fan but not if he uses this loophole - he will lose my respect!
@GMB He will get away with it ...but us joe public have to pay fines for going 5 mph over the limit  🤔🤔🤔🤔🤔😡
@GMB Do you have to sign for a speeding ticket? I don’t think you do, so anyone can say they received it a day late can’t they. Just a thought....
@GMB He never broke it on the pitch that’s for sure
@GMB He's a bloody joke and he knows it. Got no time for him

@GMB He would have earned much more respect by paying the fine (as he knew he was in the wrong) rather than looking for technicalities. However, I am sure if other people were in the same position, the majority would take the technicality route!
@GMB Disgusting behaviour, wot sort of role model is he to his children cheating his way through life !!!
@GMB Ban*
@GMB He should man up and pay the fine! With all his money he can afford it. If I were the Judge I'd van him from driving as well.
@GMB Be interesting to know what the loophole is.? Just Sup it up and pay up...
@Craigla28702960 @GMB I agree people that drive 20 in a 30 limit are as dangerous as people that speed
@GMB He should man up and take his punishment for pity sake
@GMB It's an embarrassment that he is considering challenging it. Pay up Becks and stop using your celebrity status
@GMB Any one can use this loop hole if you know how to but that doesn't mean it's right close the loop hole
@GMB The money he’s got just pay the fucking fine
@GMB tell him to do speed awareness course 😂😂
@GMB The law is to blame for having the loophole! Any one of us would have done the same.
@GMB Tight git has enough to pay and remember that poor peoples kids walk everywhere. They need to be guarded from rich folk speeding around town in big cars.
@GMB Tax dodging, fine dodging. Lovely bloke.
@GMB No Piers was quite right this morning, he admitted driving to fast, he should take his punishment just like anyone else would have to. Being rich doesn’t mean you are above the law!!
@GMB Why  not everyone else would try if they could get the best lawyer's
@GMB https://t.co/dj9qrPKtJ1

@GMB Why don't he just pay the thing. Lot of people will respect him more for doing so. You get off by any other means will seriously damage your chance of getting a Knighthood, and others will look at you poorly. Put your hands up man and except it. Still love him though.
@GMB Twat should just pay the fine like anyone else would have to. We have speed limits for a reason. If he hit another car or pedestrian at 59 mph, would he still try to get off with it. Madness.
@GMB Fighting a speeding fine again?
@GMB perhaps he can't afford the fine! 😈
@GMB Just because he got loads of money.  And very famous.  Thats dosent mean he should get away with it. He was speeding end of. If it was normal joe public.  We wouldn't be able to get away with it
@GMB Some one tell the dope that the 14 day NIP does not include bank holidays
@hkirkby69 @GMB His lawyers fee will be much higher than the fine, cheer up!
@GMB If you break the law you pay for it, it's not like Beckham hasn't got the money to pay for his speeding fine. Pay up like everyone else has to
@GMB 1 rule for the rich again , cheese me off
@GMB If you had the money to get off u would pay ,doesn’t mean you should speed but I think we’re all guilty of it at some point
@GMB Do people really care about this?
@GMB us normal folk won't be allowed to get a way with this sort of thing why do "stars" think they can
@GMB if you're done the crime do the time
@GMB Man up Dave and take responsibility for your actions like the rest of have to, is this the fine example you really want to demonstrate?
@GMB Wanker face ya punishment like a man!
@GMB If he can afford to pay lawyers, he can afford to pay his fine, which will be considerably less than paying for legal counsel. 😡
@GMB Be honest now people ... it’s human nature if you can get away with it on a technicality YOU would all do it , Piers just hates the Beckhams and should put his personal vendettas aside
@Green2020Tweet @GMB Me too

@GMB I know Suzanna doesn’t like Piers, but her dislike really came to the fore when she tried to defend the indefensible with Beckham . Just because he’s a millionaire doesn’t allow him to break the speed limit and pay a lawyer to get him off.
@GMB Be cheaper to pay the fine.... he’s such a dick
@GMB No doubt he will get off makes me sick when people with money can get out of punishment 😡😡😡
@GMB If you want to be a role model pay your fucking fine !
@GMB He will spend thousands fighting it for a £90 fine and 3 points man is a joke and people may now see the real him.
@GMB If he had run over someone he would do the right thing except if it was piers morgan
@GMB All you wingers you would do the same if you had his money
@GMB Just pay the fine and accept it you were caught deal with it.
@Craigla28702960 @GMB Speeding kills .

@GMB Just pay the fucking fine you cheap greedy selfish cunt. The fine is literally pocket change to you... that is unless your career has hit rock bottom & going broke, so you’re scavenging to save money😂

@GMB Do the crime so deal with the punishment that comes with it!! Y should ppl like him who got money get away with it?? Makes me mad!! Grow up David Beckham you broke the law at the end of the day!! Deal with it....!! @GMB
@GMB Slow news day?

@GMB Not his fault if the laws aren't good enough. Can we know the loophole please? asking for a friend 😂
Ps, if you loose your license can I look after your Bentley until you get it back please David? 🙏🙏🙏.
@GMB Is it ok to illegally put Tommy Robinson in jail?

@GMB I broke a speed limit at 1.30 am rushing my son to emergency surgery which he had at 3.02 am Sunday morning. Only 4 m over and got NO mitigation from GMP fined and pointed . Society doesn’t care police not interested .
@GMB Shameful that he's trying to wriggle out of it. Hold your hands up and take the punishment!
@GMB He admitted he broke the speed limit by some way. Dangerous driving in anyone else's book. Money talks yet again. He's guilty so he's now in prime position for his knighthood !
@GMB I thought he wasn’t denying speeding but lawyer using technicality of late service as excuse, disgusting whatever he’s using. Wasting courts time and public money.
@GMB Nice role model.  You can break the law and money will get you off scott free
@GMB He's a big boy and a role model,  take the punishment, apologise and should publicly use his lapse of concentration or stupidity as a message to all, especially younger drivers.
@GMB Bad form. If the judge let's him off on a technicality it makes it look like the rich can disobey the law.
@GMB Lets hope this over paid arsehole never knocks a child over when speeding. He is just sticking 2 fingers up at everyone, I have the money so I will do as I want. He has became a proper tosser.

@GMB Pathetic!!!!  He sure has gone down in my estimation!!,, Had he challenged the speed, I can understand!, But he admits he was speeding therefore be should man up and pay the fine!, Jeez it ain't like he is short of a few bob!!,,come on Becky do the decent thing, pay up!😉👍
@GMB Lot famous people get away lot things at time and make sure david beckham pay he speeding fine no problem they are on lot money.
@GMB If we could all afford nick freeman we would use him or similar clever lawyers.
@GMB Why not just pay fine cheaper than lawyer

@GMB I got a ticket sent back admitting it then two mths later court summons saying not received went to court told them before case I sent back “ok do you admit to speeding” yes fine £100 costs £80 and victims support £20 who was the victim
@GMB Exploiting the law, like the rich exploit the tax loophole, hand on heart would we all not do it if we could afford it or were morally corrupt 🤣🤣🤣

@GMB How hard could it be to ensure a FPN gets to X, Y, Z idiot in the allotted time? Irritating. But utilising Freeman = a very sleazy move on Dave's part. Upholding the law wasn't as apparently important to him while the spoilt man-child was speeding. Teflon Beckham strikes again 😴
@GMB Imagine if this was Raheem Sterling or Wayne Rooney.....
@GMB It's not like he can't afford the fine. If he truly was caught breaking the law, then yes, he should pay.
@GMB You broke the law by not braking enough in your Bentley now give us all a break & take the punishment like a man & not a privileged spoiled kid.
@GMB Victoria done it?  It was the cars fault @BentleyMotors

@GMB So was it late in getting sent or was it because he was in LA or in another place when it arrived ?  Take it was a speed camera  that caught him and not the police ? Just man up and take your punishment utter twat he’s becoming
@GMB Their are a lot of bullshi**ers on here, if you could get away with keeping your licence you would. Piers is just pis*d, his fine came on time.
@GMB Didn’t the ticket arrive too late ( out of time) ?
@GMB Any one with money avoids these fines and charges - pay their way out of jail or even points
@GMB Another great roll model, man up and take your medicine.
@hl_923 @GMB Who is telling you he can’t afford a fine.

@GMB How tight is this from a multimillionaire, it's pathetic. His money will get him off by employing a guy that can twist our laws to suit his wealthy clients. The laws in this country are outdated and should be changed ,
@AverageJoeBlog1 @GMB It’s his fault he was speeding. The loophole just gives him a rich mans way out. Both need fixing.

@lauracroft68 @GMB It's nothing to do with the delivery date, it's more likely the date on the official letter that he's contesting. If you were away on holiday when the letter arrived it doesn't mean to say if your not there when it's delivered it's automatically late 🙄🙄
@GMB He was on his way to see his mistress 😂

@GMB Guilty People go to court every day and get off on technicalities. Just cause he’s Beckham why should he be any different? If it was done correctly in the first place he couldn’t argue. Incompetence that’s what it is
@GMB A fixed camera got me doing 5mph over the 30 limit, I took the punishment.

@GMB Now run a poll and ask “if there was a loophole would you use it?”
I think the majority of people would!!
@GMB @DavidBeckhamOfc @GMB come on David,  this is doing "your brand" no good. Do the descent thing and take the wrap! You can't keep pretending that you're squeeky clean. 😚
@GMB Don't forget new road laws now, 1 mile over the legal limit u could lose your licence.

@GMB He admitted he broke the law but trying to get away with it because the letter was a day late? How pathetic. Take the punishment David and if you get banned hire a driver I'm sure you can afford it.

@GMB Beckham borrowed the Bentley from the dealer, the dealer would have been served Notice of intended Prosecution 
within the required period then pass it on to Beckham, he should take his punishment and not act like some spoilt kid using his celebrity and money to avoid prosecution
@GMB typical of this creep got nasty when he didnt get a gong not then nice person people think he is
@realcityofcov @GMB I voted yes @frankdavies713
@GMB I don’t mean to be funny, the man is minted!! He can more than afford to pay the fine!! So, just pay the fine & move on with life, just like the rest of us have to!!!
@realcityofcov @GMB I do personally know of a solicitor that has done a long time ago but non the less
@GMB Money's talking again ! He is guilty he admits the offence,who does he think he is? I would probably loose my licence because I'm just a man in the street.
@GMB What proof has he that he received it a day late...!!!! Will the postman be the main witness.   The law should be the same for us all regardless of money and celeb status... 😡
@GMB Yeah, because if it was any other non-famous, non-rich person, they’d be searching for loopholes as well.
@GMB Oh just pay the bloody fine like the rest of us would
@PAFCOYS @GMB Erm, well that would be a completely different scenario wouldn't it, so not at all relevant!
@GMB What proof is there that it 'arrived' one day late? Was it dated correctly in which case he might have been 'out' when posty tried to deliver as I imagine it had to be signed for.....
@Craigla28702960 @GMB And we all know what the post is like 😂😂😂
@Craigla28702960 @GMB Rich dicks always try to get out of everything and how do we know it was even a day late? Surely that’s just his word

@GMB A notice of intended prosecution has to be delivered within 14 days of the date of the offence to the registered owner of the car. This will enable the owner to inform the police as to who was driving at time of offence to allow any prosecution
@GMB Don’t blame him ! The loophole is there / he’s simply using due process and doing it legally. Blame the law not those that can find the tiniest hole in the small print. Good on him
@GMB Who cares?! Sure most people would try to get away with it if they could!
@GMB This is why brand Beckham makes me sick

@airwalk72 @GMB No it’s not. He’s exploiting a loophole. You and I could do the same. Don’t blame him - blame the law for having a loophole ! I too have got off a speeding five using the same technicality . It’s genius
@GMB Buying his way out.

@GMB Why should he get away with it - the man's got more money than sense - a complete moron , get over it, pay the fine. Driving at that speed in a built up area you could have killed somebody then it would be a very different story.
@GMB @susannareid100 quoting the letter of the law about when letters should be sent, but not about how fast you can drive!!!
@Craigla28702960 @GMB Tough shit. Not like he can afford the insurance if it goes up or maybe he has other points for speeding and the points will take him to a ban
@GMB It will just take him further away from that knighthood he craves so much 😂😂
@GMB This was then .... “The footballer, 24, was found guilty of speeding at 76mph in a 50mph limit”  ... https://t.co/nRQCBFD0JI same old, same old ##GMB #Beckham
@GMB Ain’t as if it can’t afford it
@GMB #disappointing
@GMB 2 yuk characters together- Beckham who thinks he can do anything 🙄 and Freeman who loves his “celebrity” limelight !
@Craigla28702960 @GMB Blimey big road lol but point still stays he’s done the crime pay the fine
@GMB Simple really, speeding yes or no. Loop holes and people with money just stinks..pay your fine and take the punishment like a man. 🙏🏾
@GMB David broke the law, speed limits are there for our safety, he should be punished, simple..
@GMB *what, you know not who

@GMB If the loop hole didn't exist then his lawyer wouldn't be able to use it, I think he should just pay the fine but that said he has every right to use a loop hole just like everyone else. Just change the law so it can't be used now it's been publicised
@GMB What’s the point of the 14 day rule if it can’t be disputed?

@GMB If I didn’t have my admin in order & missed paying the fine by one day, my fine would be doubled & I would be expected to pay it. They didn’t issue it within the given time. Not the time he received it, but the time it was issued, so he shouldn’t have to pay. Look at a law change
@GMB It's not a loophole.... it's the law.  If the ticket was too late...it was too late and that's that.

@GMB WTF should he get away with breaking the law...? Unbelievable he gets a bent lawyer to bale him out ,.except what u have done, the arrogance of the man .. irrespective of the fine being late..? Makes me sick .. except it and move on...
@GMB I have broken the speed limit over a technicality. I technically didn’t take my foot of the pedal.
@Craigla28702960 @GMB I also don’t happen to know the road he was caught on as I don’t live in London. Don’t people cross that road? Again I’ve no idea as I don’t live there
@GMB Of course it's right for him to use this technicality to get off, why wouldn't he?

@GMB The Beckhams get right on my nerves, they think they are royalty that they are not. Why should David Beckham aka Golden balls get away with a speeding fine, accept responsibility for your own actions and accept the consequences 😡
@Craigla28702960 @GMB Blah blah blah same context really. At the end of the day he was speeding, he got caught, admitted it now pay the fine and take the points
@GMB He's getting further & further away from the knighthood he desperately wants
@GMB Who are the idiots saying no like they wouldn’t do it themselves
@GMB Maybe he’s broke and can’t afford it 😂
@GMB We live in an age where if you have the money you can literally “get away with murder”
@jenny_brierley @GMB 🙄
@GMB @GMB @piersmorgan just pay it he’s probably paying more for the lawyer to get him off plus what’s that message he giving his kids don’t worry u do wrong you don’t have to pay !!!
@GMB No way golden balls or not 😡
@GMB For the price of mr loophole I'd of just took points and fine
@GMB if he was caught speeding he pays the fine like anyone else would, the money he is spending on his lawyer he could have paid the fine
@Craigla28702960 @GMB Speeding drivers kill or seriously injure people every day, of course we should care.
@GMB Just take the punishment and stop speeding. Speeding kills and its against the law. Simple just stick to speed limit. Its not rocket science 🚀🚀😡😡😡😡😠😠
@Craigla28702960 @GMB Oh that’s ok then I guess 🙄 https://t.co/RI4FwWNAOj
@GMB What’s the loophole?
@GMB No-one else gets away with it so why should he. Besides he can afford to pay it.
@GMB If i received a speeding ticket and knew i had been speeding i wouldn’t think of going to a lawyer to try and find a loophole.
@GMB Everybody would get off a speeding fine if they could somehow. Stupid not to
@GMB The problem is not with D Beckham, it’s with the law. There should be a way of correcting technicality issues without throwing the baby out with the bath water.
@GMB The self entitled brat has done this before hasn't he?

@GMB Beckham broke law by speeding - the law says if the authorities choose to take action it must bring charges within a given time period
They failed to do that - do you want to ignore the law?

Anyone else would fight it to avoid points & increased insurance

#GMB

@GMB Well said @piersmorgan , you commit the crime you pay for it. Why should he be getting away with it? Ohhh silly, got himself an expensive lawyer😲 @susannareid100 stop sitting on the fence, so annoying 😠
@GMB Why should he get away with it!? Speed limits are there for a reason! Could have killed someone.
@GMB who cares

@GMB No   He knew what he was doing. So take the consequences for your actions But of course he will get away with it  because he’s a celebrity. If it was me I’d be fined and points on my license   What gives him the right to think he can do whatever he likes
@GMB Piers Morgan is a hypocrite he has used loopholes in the law with the phone hacking and shares scandal.
@GMB Loop holes seem 2 b ways of the rich & famous getting out of things 🤬😤
@GMB Yes, it is right, but be safe in the knowledge there is justice for those who have & those that have not.
@GMB He's not above the law and has earned millions over the past 20 years or so. Pay the damn fine.
@FAIntermediary @GMB Absolutely 👍🏻
@GMB It’s not his fault loopholes exist, blame the law makers
@GMB Does the fact he was driving a Bentley make any difference?
@Craigla28702960 @GMB Would you be saying that if he hit and killed someone when doing that speed?
@GMB He's not above the law
@GMB The law should have made an example of him. It's up to the judge whether he/she allows such loopholes to be used. Should be questioning #Beckham's intentions and morals!
@GMB one rule for one , one for another ,  insult to the average man
@GMB So if you are rich and famous you are ok to break speed limits because you can just hire a hot shot lawyer, he did the speeding he should face the punishment might make him think next time.
@GMB He was speeding, he’s admitted it just pay the bloody fine like the rest of us have to

@GMB If the law has been broken in procedure then the State loses its right of conviction.  These are the same rules that apply to everyone in the criminal and civil justice system.  Its better known as the natural rules of justice and applies to all.
@GMB it probably cost him more than the fine to pay for this lawyer
@GMB Not like he can’t afford the fine!
@GMB He was speeding, pretty much admitted to it so should just take whatever is coming to him. Makes me sick!
@GMB It comes down to the law more than the lawyers, we would all do it if we could afford the lawyers.  Lets look at the loopholes more than the person challenging it.
Is it okay for David Beckham's lawyers to use a 'loophole' to fight a speeding fine?
@GMB Ask Suzanna if Beckham had caused a crash and killed a child of hers doing 59mph in a 40 zone he should get away with it if the courts took a day to long to contact him about the crime?
